ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 12 cores x 4 FP32/cycle (NEON 128-bit) x 2 (FMA) x 2 pipes = 192 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 12 cores x 8 FP16/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) x 2 pipes = 384 FP16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 12 cores x 16 INT8/cycle (NEON) x 2 x 2 = 768 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (2200 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: 12-core ARM Cortex-A78AE cluster with NEON SIMD (128-bit). 2x CPU cores vs Orin Nano. Shares LPDDR5 memory with GPU.
